naslov: Sevid, MEDITERANSKA KUĆA S PANORAMSKIM POGLEDOM // video -ČITAJ OPIS (prodaja)
opis: - ekskluzivna prodaja agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina.Agencija je u sustavu pdv-a te se na sve usluge obračunava pdv. NAPOMENA: detaljne slike i videa apartmana, lokacije, plaže, šaljemo na upit + You Tube video link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PaL3fsIMPW8 Prodajemo mediteransku kuću u Sevidu, idiličnom turističkom mjestu s očaravajućim panoramskim pogledom na kristalno čisto more i slikovite otoke. Ova prekrasna nekretnina nudi savršenu kombinaciju privatnosti i prirodnog okruženja, idealno za bijeg od ljetnih vrućina. Smještena samo 60 metara od plaže, kuća je pravi raj za ljubitelje mora. Kuća se ponosi sa tri prostrana dvosobna apartmana, svaki s neometanim pogledom na more koji oduzima dah. Apartmani su potpuno opremljeni i namješteni, spremni za ugodan boravak ili iznajmljivanje. Dvorište je okruženo bogatim mediteranskim biljem; maslinama, limunima, orasima, palmama i ružmarinom, stvarajući mirisnu oazu koja osigurava privatnost i mir. - stambeno 160m2 na okućnici od 450m2 / zasebna parcela (parking) od cca 200m2, nalazi se 70m od kuće - PRIZEMLJE (dvosobni apartman sa terasom / 63.75m2) // KAT (dva dvosobna apartmana sa balkonima / 96.21m2) - gradnja 2003.godine / zadnja adaptacija 2011.godine uz konstantno 'osvježavanje' i renoviranje kroz godine - mogućnost NADOGRADNJE - udaljenost do kuće od javne ceste 25m (32 stepenice) / do plaže 60m (70 stepenica) Bilo da tražite obiteljski ljetni odmor ili priliku za turističko iznajmljivanje, ova kuća je savršen izbor. Ne propustite priliku da postanete vlasnik ovog komadića mediteranskog raja. Za više informacija i dogovor o razgledavanju, slobodno me kontaktirajte. Vaša mediteranska oaza čeka na vas! LOKACIJA: https://www.google.com/maps/place/43%C2%B029'57.7%22N+16%C2%B001'09.8%22E/@43.4992637,16.0185244,273m/data=!3m1!1e3!4m4!3m3!8m2!3d43.4993611!4d16.0193889?entry=ttu ENG................................................................ ........................................................................ - exclusive sale of the agency #adriaINgroup - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% + vat of the sales price Dear clients, viewing the property is only possible with a signed brokerage contract, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on Brokerage in Real Estate Transactions. NOTE: we send detailed pictures and videos of the apartment, location, beach upon request + You Tube video link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PaL3fsIMPW8 We are selling a Mediterranean house in Sevid, an idyllic tourist spot with an enchanting panoramic view of the crystal clear sea and picturesque islands. This beautiful property offers the perfect combination of privacy and natural surroundings, ideal for escaping the summer heat. Located only 60 meters from the beach, the house is a true paradise for sea lovers. The house boasts three spacious two-room apartments, each with an unobstructed and breathtaking view of the sea. The apartments are fully equipped and furnished, ready for a pleasant stay or rental. The yard is surrounded by rich Mediterranean plants; olives, lemons, walnuts, palm trees and rosemary, creating a fragrant oasis that ensures privacy and peace. - residential 160m2 on a plot of 450m2 / separate plot (parking) of 200m2, located 70m from the house - GROUND FLOOR (two-room apartment with terrace / 63.75m2) // FLOOR (two two-room apartments with balconies / 96.21m2) - construction in 2003 / last adaptation in 2011 with constant "refreshing" and renovation over the years - possibility of UPGRADING - distance to the house from the public road 25m (32 steps) / to the beach 60m (70 steps) Whether you are looking for a family summer vacation or a tourist rental opportunity, this house is the perfect choice. Do not miss the opportunity to become the owner of this piece of Mediterranean paradise. For more information and to arrange a viewing, feel free to contact me. Your Mediterranean oasis is waiting for you!
